article_title: Colorado Therapeutic Riding Center celebrates 35 years
article_text:
Colorado Therapeutic Riding Center celebrates 35 years

Owen Ulbrich rides over obstacles with his horse, Choice, during his turn in the outdoor arena at the celebration of the 35th anniversary of the Colorado Therapeutic Riding Center. The center put on a horse show Sunday with all of the riders who currently use its programs, from youths to adults. (Cliff Grassmick / Staff Photographer) The Colorado Therapeutic Riding Center celebrated its 35th anniversary Sunday with a horse show featuring all of the riders who currently use the center's programs, from youths to adults.

article_metadata.description: Becky Weickmann, above, holds up her ribbon with pride as horse walker Nicole Towner watches during a horse show Sunday in celebration of  the Colorado Therapeutic Riding Center's 35th anniversary.
